blog.name: theemotionaldm
blog.title: Dungeon Meister
blog.description:
Hey, welcome!  This blog sometimes has content!  Hopefully there's enough of that to keep your interest.  If not.... well, enjoy the shitposting!  Asks are ALWAYS open for DM Advice, and you can find a log of that content on my page!  (D&D content blog.  18-year-vet DM who thinks ya'll young ones are the best. 
 Old-at-heart DM, not actually that old.  28, He/him, Bi.)

blog.name: brightandshinynewstories
blog.title: What's This Blog About? I Don't Know Either
blog.description:
I like so many things. Maybe too many.
27, she/her, icon by @sheepskin

summary: Dairon, giving Beau advice: So, listen. Be patient. Protect these friends you’ve made, but don’t get too close. Beau:...
body:
Dairon, giving Beau advice: So, listen. Be patient. Protect these friends you’ve made, but don’t get too close.

Beau: I…haven’t.

Dairon: Good. Now I need to go and collect my things, my birds, my materials for travel–

Beau: Did you name your birds?

Dairon, taken aback: No. Do not get too close.

Beau: You should have Jester name your birds–

Dairon: I named a bird once and it never came back, so I do not name my birds.

Beau: She has a ferret named Sprinkle that has survived against all fucking odds, Dairon! I’m just saying, maybe…

Jester, knocking on the door: It’s a weasel!

Beau: She has a ferret named Sprinkle that has survived against all fucking odds, Dairon! I’m just saying, maybe…

Jester, knocking on the door: It’s a weasel!

description:
I started writing that Perc'ahlia pen pals AU btw:

Chapters: 14/?
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Percival “Percy” Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III/Vex'ahlia
Characters: Percival “Percy” Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III, Vex'ahlia (Critical Role), Vax'ildan (Critical Role)
Additional Tags: Pen Pals, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence
Summary:

Dear Vex'ahlia Vessar

I humbly ask that you refer to me as Percival lest your wrist collapse from exhaustion after writing out my complete title in what I hope to be a long and comfortable correspondence…

blog.name: fisherrend
blog.title: DnD Creations
blog.description: Self-taught creative mind from Sweden. There is nothing I love more than to draw, write and make shit up. Here you will find maps, characters, races, monsters, original characters, fan characters and other bits and pieces made, drawn or written by me. All homebrew content is available for public use; just don't claim it as your own. Please do share though if you use anything I've made, I'd love to showcase your creations!

summary: These are by far my favorite characters that I’ve made. Lady Lor-Elaine Vex’ahlia Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo / Lor-Elaine...
caption:
These are by far my favorite characters that I’ve made.

Lady Lor-Elaine Vex’ahlia Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo / Lor-Elaine
Human (quarter elf) Gunslinger Fighter/Rogue Assassin/Fiend Warlock

Carnelis Clay / Carnelis
Firbolg Grave Cleric/TwilightDruid

Fhur’tael Zan’thi ji Varosza D’Mae / Furtail
Archfey/Tiefling Glamour Bard/Dreams Druid

Orianna de Norena Perielle / Murmur
Tiefling Glamour Bard


I think Lor-Elaine tops out as my favorite. She’s a lawful evil genius sniper and I just love the potential she’d have as a big bad in the M9 campaign. Heck, I even wrote a short story based on her existence! And I have another story in my head about the events that caused the shock of white in her hair. We’ll see if I ever write it out, it’d be dark.

Also I’m just really happy with her general design.

I never imagined that two fan-characters would end up being two of my favorite ones. But I guess that’s a testament to the amazing worldbuilding and storytelling of Matt Mercer, and the incredible character making of the Critical Role cast.
